name: Order!
overview: "King! "Is a king simulation game that you can play slowly. There is a demon king, there is a brave, there are people working in the town's inhabitants and castles. In such a fantasy world, you can become a king of a certain country and experience a full-blown king. There is no one brave in this world. Born one after another, each adventure begins. The king can help the braves, or call and call for work. Of course, you can issue orders to your subordinates to develop the country and war with other countries. It is also good to help the brutal and help the suppression of the devil. It is good to protect yourself by doing the side of the devil. It is also good to aim the king himself to kill the devil. It is good to develop your own country anyway, saying the braves and the demon king. Everything is your freedom. Please enjoy the unlimited world you want to do as a king.
